entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Temiskaming Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
